Hellpeon cackle evil as the aura around the bot intensified, the 
floors beneath the bot soon melted and buckled under the massive ball 
of chaochitan energy as the walls around him and the room also melted 
and buckled. He then turned to the harpoon which would have hit him 
but instead it rammed into the field of Chaochitan energy making it 
melt before it reached him. The energy ball continued to grow and 
this time six beams were fired otu from it in various directions 
throughout the trianer base.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Power flashed as the computer lost control of the base. "I have 
commands
> comeing in from outside the base." it exclaimed.
> 
> "Well block them." Ignatius called back knowing he wouldn't last 
long if the
> Stasis field fell.
> 
> "I can't" the computer commented, "They're coming in on a priority
> frequency." The computer was confused since there was only one bot 
with the
> priority codes that could override his systems. "I suggest you run 
like the
> abyss was opening beneath you because all hells about to break 
loose." The
> ravings of the computer were overshadowed as Ignatius turned and 
opened fire
> on the hostages spreading the full fury from his Talons at each and 
every
> one of them. "Zoe, wherever you are get the Pit out of here."
> 
> As the lone Trainer opened fire the power was cut to the bridge 
returning
> the functions to the captives.
> 
> Throughout the halls the defenses lose power and hang uselessly 
from the
> walls and ceilings where they were once contained.
> 
> Outside the base the Autoguns returned to the sand which once hid 
them.

the

> > > was an act of desperation on the bases part to halt any further
